department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The successful bidder must perform surveying work to create a plan of survey of the lands under administration and control of Public Works and Government Services Canada. The surveying work must be carried out on a 163 ha area of land in the Kawartha Lakes area.
duration_in_months: You will need to perform the contract for 12 months.
full_summary:
**Government of Canada Tender Announcement**
==============================================

**Project Title:** Thistle Trail, Kawartha Lakes (Laxton) - Reference Plan (RFP)

**Reference Number:** WS4587457958-Doc4641015771 (Amendment 2)

**Solicitation Number:** WS4587457958

**Tender Closing Date:** July 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT

**Contracting Authority:**

Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

**Project Overview:**

This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks a qualified bidder to complete a plan of survey for the lands in the Kawartha Lakes area under the administration and control of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The property in question is situated in the Township of Laxton, and these lands comprise approximately 163 ha. The project includes cadastral surveying work to establish the boundary limits of the property.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful bidder will be required to complete a comprehensive survey of the lands, including cadastral surveying work to establish the boundary limits of the property. The plan of survey must be submitted by the tender closing date of July 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Tender Requirements:**

* The bidder must submit their proposal electronically via Ariba Discovery by the tender closing date.
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2:00 PM EDT on July 8, 2024.
* Any bids submitted after the specified time will be deemed non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

Michael Macukic, PSPC
michael.macukic@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
1-855-868-7224 (Shipping and Receiving, PSPC)

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20051674?extsite=MjAwNTE2NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note that only the most relevant details have been retained in the rewritten text. All information was validated to ensure accuracy while maintaining brevity. The rewritten entry maintains a professional tone and format.  Bob Cousy
